[console_scripts]
ewoks-canvas = ewoksorange.gui.canvas.main:main

[ewoks.engines]
orange = ewoksorange.engine:OrangeWorkflowEngine

[ewoks.engines.serialization.representations]
ows = ewoksorange.engine:OrangeWorkflowEngine

[oasys.addon]
ewoksdemo = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo
ewoksnowidget = orangecontrib.ewoksnowidget

[oasys.widgets]
Ewoks Demo = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo
Ewoks Test = orangecontrib.ewokstest
Ewoks Without Widgets = orangecontrib.ewoksnowidget

[orange.canvas.help]
html-index = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo:WIDGET_HELP_PATH

[orange.widgets]
Ewoks Demo = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo
Ewoks Test = orangecontrib.ewokstest
Ewoks Without Widgets = orangecontrib.ewoksnowidget

[orange.widgets.tutorials]
Ewoks Demo = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo.tutorials
Ewoks Test = orangecontrib.ewokstest.tutorials

[orange3.addon]
ewoksdemo = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo
ewoksnowidget = orangecontrib.ewoksnowidget

[orangecanvas.examples]
Ewoks Demo = orangecontrib.ewoksdemo.tutorials
Ewoks Test = orangecontrib.ewokstest.tutorials
